name: SuperBomber (Nien's Games)
description:
You are playing as a last surviving warrior, enter a dungeon, where those monsters are waiting and fight them off. 

OBJECTIVE: Blow all of the enemies, complete all level (Currently 2)

BREAK CRATE TO GET POWER UP !!!
There are 3 power ups:
-Speed power up is chicken makes you go faster
-Bomb power up is the bomb makes you place more bombs
-Range power up is the accuracy sign increases the bomb's range.

Timing is key to win the game

CONTROLLERS

WASD / Gamepad left stick - Move

Spacebar - Place bomb

Escape - Pause
